```{r include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(tinytex)
library(hms)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
options(tinytex.verbose = TRUE)
```


```{r}
NewData <- read.csv("C:/Users/christine.iyer/Box/quarterly-ad-analytics-projects/Flowchart.csv", header = T, stringsAsFactors = F)
```

```{r}
NewDataFY19Q3 <- NewData %>% filter(Quarter == "FY20Q3" & str_detect(Ad, "HS"))
NewDataFY19Q3 <- NewDataFY19Q3[,c(4:12)]
landscape(knitr::kable(NewDataFY19Q3, "latex", caption = "FY20 Q3 Campaign to HS Students", booktabs = T))%>%
kable_styling(full_width = T)  %>%
  row_spec(0, angle = -45)
```



```{r}
NewDataFY19Q3 <- NewData %>% filter(Quarter == "FY20Q3" & str_detect(AdSet, "FA21_UG_IN_PIN_DISP_BR"))
NewDataFY19Q3 <- NewDataFY19Q3[,c(4:12)]
landscape(knitr::kable(NewDataFY19Q3, "latex", caption = "FY20 Q3 Campaign to Influencers", booktabs = T))%>%
kable_styling(full_width = T)  %>%
  row_spec(0, angle = -45)
```
